column4: I have installed compiz, but I cannot run it (alt+f2 > type "compiz" > enter), the screen blinks just like that,, how to open the compiz window?
do you mean a Vista Emerald theme ?
well, you simply have to install Emerald
well, after installing Emerald, you'll have to go to System -> Preferences -> Advanced Desktop Effects Settings -> Windows Decoration, and set the "Command" field to "emerald --replace"
I have added it to the Emerald Themer, how to activate it?
have you changed the Command field in Windows Decoration ?
no advanced desktop settings in my PC
go to Synaptics and check if compizconfig-settings-manager is installed
